data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":null,"id":309811,"title":"Shadows on the Wall","original_title":"Shadows on the Wall","overview":"A modern day sci-fi about Palmer Marshall, a struggling engineering student that’s flailing through his personal life, classes, and career. Palmer is on the cusp of a potentially huge discovery and he devotes every waking moment to the challenging, and often fruitless, pursuit of creating something that might change the world. But Palmer soon learns that the road to success is long and fraught with failure. Despite crippling anxiety and personality disorders, Palmer perseveres and creates the one – the dream machine that he’ll be remembered for.","poster_path":"/2enHkkT5uxAjxw3ZsRrUJgedppb.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,878],"popularity":1.511,"release_date":"2014-12-10","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":260146,"title":"Kara Murat: Denizler Hakimi","original_title":"Kara Murat: Denizler Hakimi","overview":"It is the Fatih's reign..
